actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to support the construction of a memorial building at the Hoover Institution on War, Revolution, and Peace as memorial to Herbert Hoover.

summary.text: Herbert Hoover Memorial Act - Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to make grants for the construction of a memorial building at the Hoover Institution on War, Revolution, and Peace, as a memorial to Herbert Hoover, at Stanford, California. Authorizes the appropriation of up to $7,000,000 for such purpose.

titles.title: A bill to support the construction of a memorial building at the Hoover Institution on War, Revolution, and Peace as memorial to Herbert Hoover.
